overview: Denise Fleury supports her invalid mother in the Montmartre slums by making artificial flowers in a factory. When she loses her job, Denise is convinced by her friend Suzanne to join her working in a cabaret.
tagline: A tale of Paris-Of Parisians-of Parisiennes. Adapted from Pierre Wolffs's famous drama "The Gutter."
title: The Virtuous Model
